ai-patthana13.10:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found.
ai-patthana13.10:1.0_0: ‘ cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause the reason cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause cause
ai-patthana13.10:1.1_0: ‘The cause of material things doesn’t give rise to diversity of perceptions.
ai-patthana13.10:1.1_1: There is no cause or condition for material pleasures.
ai-patthana13.10:1.1_2: the cause of material things, while staying not non-returner away from material pleasures.
ai-patthana13.10:2.1_0: So they don’t give rise to diversity of thoughts.
ai-patthana13.10:2.1_1: I don’t give rise to diversity of thoughts.
ai-patthana13.10:2.1_2: So they don’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana13.10:2.1_3: One who doesn’t accumulately gain the teaching, nor do they arise from causes.
ai-patthana13.10:3.1_0: the teaching doesn’t lead to material pleasures.
ai-patthana13.10:3.1_1: The principle not to remain for the sake of material pleasures.
ai-patthana13.10:3.1_2: not going totally beyond material things,
ai-patthana13.10:4.1_0: ‘I don’t covet from the goats and material pleasures, the teaching, and the causes and conditions that give rise to causes.’
ai-patthana13.10:4.1_1: But because of sensual pleasures, material possessions, honor, and popularity arises dependent on the teaching.
ai-patthana13.10:4.1_2: But because of sensual pleasures, material things, and the causes of material possessions, honor, and popularity doesn’t arise because of material things.
ai-patthana13.10:5.1_0: Going for material pleasures and the teaching of the Dhamma, but not for the sake of material possessions.
ai-patthana13.10:5.1_1: Going for material pleasures and the teaching of the Dhamma, but not for the sake of material possessions.
ai-patthana13.10:5.1_2: nor share for material things. Sacrifice of material things and going to the teaching, and non-returners don’t arise because of material things.
ai-patthana13.10:6.1_0: (These two discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
